messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] KTK
messages.msgSnippet: Ron, check that pointer I sent you a while ago - its currently pointing at the almost ready for prime time version, and if you look in the online directory
messages.messageBody:
Ron,

check that pointer I sent you a while ago - its currently pointing at the "almost ready for prime time"
version, and if you look in the online directory where it resides, you'll see the cover - I've got to add one more short article, finish the corrections (this one is a few days behind on error correction),
and I'll be shooting it off to lulu...

rkg

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] KTK
messages.msgSnippet: No catalogue is planned for this year, so I understand. There may be a 2005 suppliment coming out eventually, showing all the items not illustrated in the 2005
messages.messageBody:
No catalogue is planned for this year, so I understand. There may be a 2005 suppliment coming out eventually, showing all the items not illustrated in the 2005 catalogue but its premature for me to to say much about this right now. All takes a lot of work to produce a quality publication, work and money. If and when something can be announced I'll definitely "put the word out" to everyone.

Ron
STL

From: Kenneth Wilson

Ken

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] KTK
messages.msgSnippet: There will be a KTK published book with fotos of the 2005 KTK show submitted items that were not in that years catalog.  It will be a stand alone book that
messages.messageBody:
There will be a KTK published book with fotos of the 2005 KTK show submitted
items that were not in that years catalog. It will be a stand alone book that
should be out by September, 2007. There are no plans for a new catalog for
this year.
Jurgis

http://discover.aol.com/memed/aolcom30tour


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] KTK
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know anything about catalog plans for this year, but I think Richard George is working on a photo book of the US and Canadian items that were not shown
messages.messageBody:
I don't know anything about catalog plans for this year, but I think Richard
George is working on a photo book of the US and Canadian items that were not
shown in the 2005 catalog.

Craig
